about_the_game:
《Shiyuh of Love》

Shiyuh of love is a text-based visual novel game. In the story, players take on the role of the protagonist, Kevin, spending a summer with Shiyuh, a mysterious girl who suddenly appears in his home. Together, they gradually uncover the secrets of their intertwined pasts, leading toward the story's conclusion.

《Game Features》

- Spend unique moments with Shiyuh based on your choices!

- Approximately 70,000 words of storyline.

- Two different endings and several beautifully crafted CG illustrations.

《About This Game》

Hello everyone, I’m Zera, the person in charge of The Love of Tianhe, and also a member of a project team at Taichung University of Science and Technology. I’d like to share with you the story behind the creation of this game.

When we were preparing to submit our project proposal, we had already set a clear goal: “We want to create a bishoujo visual novel and publish it on Steam.”

So, we boldly wrote the title The Love of Tianhe on the proposal, and that marked the beginning of this game.

Although I might be letting you down a bit by saying this, we know there’s still room for improvement in various aspects of the game—be it the illustrations, the system, or missing features.

That’s why I hope this game serves as our starting point, and I also hope that all of you can continue to support us in the future.

If there are people out there who wish to chase dreams with us, we’d love to collaborate with you.
